TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TransactionException extends System.SystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when you attempt to do work on a transaction that cannot accept new work.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TransactionException is a recoverable error, and all the exceptions thrown by the <xref:System.Transactions> infrastructure derive from this exception.

Docs.param: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception. For more information, see the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
